    About üëã

    Reinforcement Learning Playground was created by Mrityunjay Bhardwaj while going through RL Books and Literature. The goal of this website is to make reinforcement learning a bit more accessible through interactive visualizations (designed using Mike Bostock‚Äôs JavaScript library D3.js).
